description: Implement detection for abandoned phases left IN_PROGRESS. Failure Mode: Agent crashed during phase execution, leaving phase in IN_PROGRESS state. Detection Mechanism: Identify phases with status IN_PROGRESS after agent returns; Check completion_at is None (never finished); Extract phase name and position in execution log. Recovery Suggestions Generated: 1) WHY: Agent left phase IN_PROGRESS, indicating unhandled error or timeout; 2) HOW: Reset phase to NOT_EXECUTED for clean retry; 3) Actionable: /nw:execute command with step file path
acceptance_criteria: Detects IN_PROGRESS phases after agent completion; Extracts phase name and position; Generates 3+ recovery suggestions; Suggestions include transcript path reference; Suggestions formatted with WHY + HOW + command
test_scenario_coverage: AC-005.1 - Crash recovery detection and suggestions
